3. REFERRAL & LINKAGES
3.1 Up referral with PHC, CHC, DH/MC
3.1.1 Pradhan Mantri Surakshit Matritwa Ashwasan(PMSMA)
3.1.1.1 CHO should ensure that all pregnant women in second and third trimester should compulsorily attend 
at least one PMSMA clinic.
